title: 10 OPI Nail Polish Colors You’ll See Everywhere In 2025
description: If there’s one thing OPI knows, it’s how to nail a trend — literally. Whenever we stumble across a viral nail polish video on TikTok, nine times out of 10 it’s an OPI shade swatch. We still remember when our feeds were taken over by one viral Hailey Bieber manicure after another, from vanilla chrome nails (that’s OPI in the shade Funny Bunny, in case you’re wondering) to the more Y2K-inspired digital lavender.OPI has always been ahead of the curve, even before the days of social media. OPI cofounder Suzi Weiss-Fischmann is the mastermind behind various tongue-in-cheek names that made many of its offerings instant classics, like I'm Not Really a Waitress and Don't Bossa Nova Me Around. And let’s not forget fan favorites like Big Apple Red or Lincoln Park After Dark, which have been trademarked due to their universal popularity.We’ve tapped Lia Smith, OPI’s brand education manager, to help us pick out a list of bestselling shades the internet just can’t get enough of. Browse ahead for colors that will inspire your 2025 polish refresh.All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.For more can't-miss shopping stories delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our Most Wanted newsletter.Funny BunnyIt’s not surprising that Funny Bunny has a spot on this list, given its heavy celebrity endorsement. This white shade formed the backbone of Hailey Bieber’s vanilla chrome manicure, and Sofia Richie Grange also famously wore it to her wedding rehearsal dinner. It’s a lovely sheer cream that turns milky white when you pile on a second coat.Shop UltaOPI Infinite Shine Funny Bunny, $, available at UltaGot The Blues For Red“Rich wine tones are having a moment,” says Smith. “We’ve been seeing a lot of shades that evoke mellow red wine and sumptuous burgundy reds.” Case in point: this TikTok on Got The Blues For Red, a cool-toned dark red, that has received over 330K likes. It’s the kind of jewel tone that we want to peeking from our sweater sleeves as soon as there’s a hint of chill in the air.Shop UltaOPI Got The Blues For Red, $, available at UltaNot Afraid Of The DarkCall it the Espresso effect, but we’re all about brown nail colors lately. This rich caramel reminds us of golden leaves, hot chocolate and chai lattes — aka all the cold-weather comforts that get tons of social media love during the most wonderful time of the year.Shop UltaOPI Infinite Shine Not Afraid Of The Dark, $, available at UltaBubble BathAsk any beauty editor to list their favorite nail colors and Bubble Bath will likely make the cut. The subtle pink is a top selling shade and imparts a clean, classic finish. Hot tip: the Bubble Bath nail lacquer boasts more of a blush undertone, while the Infinite Shine gel-effect version skews more neutral.Shop UltaOPI Bubble Bath, $, available at OPIAwe Night LongThe most viral shades at this time of year offer “a smooth richness with depth,” according to Smith. “Deep, enveloping blues and greys that mirror the marbled hues of the night sky perfectly capture the mood,” she adds. This luscious sparkly blue reminds us of the galaxy of stars we love to see on crisp winter evenings.Shop UltaOPI Infinite Shine Awe Night Long, $, available at OPIKyoto PearlThe universal appeal of white nail polish is undeniable. This pearlescent white is lauded as the perfect bridal nail color on TikTok, racking up millions of views in the process. To us, the color resembles a freshly made bed that we never want to leave on lazy mornings. Shop UltaOPI Kyoto Pearl, $, available at UltaMalaga WineTikTok beauty enthusiasts describe this glossy red as the perfect red nail polish for sweater weather. It’s the kind of long-lasting color that looks good on absolutely anyone and with everything.Shop UltaOPI Infinite Shine Malaga Wine, $, available at UltaMy Private JetSmith predicts that darker, stormier shades will continue to gain traction to mirror the more brooding weather. This rich mocha hue mixes things up with a shimmery dusting of gold, red, and green glitter.Shop UltaOPI Infinite Shine My Private Jet, $, available at UltaPassionDon’t sleep on Passion: Beauty creators have been calling this lovely sheer pink the perfect mix between Funny Bunny and Bubble Bath, with a “your nails, but better” finish and no streaks. Shop UltaOPI Infinite Shine Passion, $, available at OPIBlack Cherry ChutneyThis black-red is the party-ready version of Malaga Wine. It features a subtle dose of glitter that will pair perfectly with any lush velvet outfit this festive season.Shop UltaOPI Black Cherry Chutney, $, available at UltaLike what you see?
